=Linux Dependencies=

==Debian==
 * libtiff-tools
 * imagemagick  (command convert is used)


==Red Hat==
 * tempfile command is missing in the Kakadu compress script => use:   

TIFF_TMP1="/tmp/$$a.tif";
TIFF_TMP2="/tmp/$$b.tif";

.. instead

packages: ImageMagick
(yum install ImageMagick)



= Java =
 * JVM from Oracle is strongly recommended and tested
 * OpenJDK have problems with the Djatoka/Kakadu extract script
